mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item VALUES(null, #{item_name}, #{item_loc}, #{item_detail}, #{cate_code}, #{lat}, #{lng}, null, current_date(), #{exp_days})
mapper.update: UPDATE item set item_name=#{item_name}, item_loc=#{item_loc}, item_detail=#{item_detail}, cate_code=#{cate_code}, lat=#{lat}, lng=#{lng}, exp_days=#{exp_days})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item i INNER JOIN `option` o ON i.item_code=o.item_code WHERE i.item_code=${item_code}
